content:
# The original stone furnace has successfully smelted the iron ore into 10 iron plates! 
# The inventory now shows that we have 5 units of coal and 5 units of stone remaining, while the copper furnace has produced a total of 6 copper plates.

# With 10 iron plates available, we can now craft transport belts or other useful components. 
# Let's proceed to craft 5 transport belts now that we have the required materials.

# Attempt to craft 5 transport belts.
craft_item(Prototype.TransportBelt, quantity=5)  # Craft 5 transport belts
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()} after crafting transport belts.")  # Final inventory check after crafting
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()} after crafting transport belts.")  # Check entities status again. 

# If successful, we can now begin to set up our transport system!
